dialogue: Quinn! Dude! You have to stop calling me!
Wait...are you breaking up with me!?
Are we no longer best friends?
Dude, calm down. We're still best friends. Just quit calling me while I'm at work!
So...we're still besties? BFFs? Heterosexual life partners?
And you'll always come through for me, right? That's what friendship is all about!
I mean...yeah. I'll always be there for you. You're my best friend.
Awesome! I'll call you again in a bit!
I hang up. What a pal, hey?
